content.description: Sit start with a left hand crimp and a big, right hand sidepull.  From there, make two big moves on jugs (crux) with the right hand, reach the diagonal shelf, then traverse left until the boulder's apex, and top out the problem.
content.protection: A pad or two, there is a great landing on this one.
content.location: This is on the North face of Boxcar Boulder.

content.description:
Googol One is a short, technical problem that climbs small crimps on a highly oxidized face.

Sit start with a left hand edge and a big right hand sidepull.  From there, establish the feet on the face, move a left hand to a small edge, bump through it to a three-finger crimp, move the right hand to another three-finger crimp, then hit the big shelf and the eventual top out that lies straight up.
content.protection: A few pads, the landing is perfect though.
content.location: This ascends the North face of Boxcar Boulder.
